Sentencas: The quantitative analysis and interpretation of button-cell experiments usually depends upon assuming isothermal conditions together with uniform and known gas composition within the gas compartments.
Titulo: Multidimensional flow, thermal, and chemical behavior in solid-oxide fuel cell button cells

Sentencas: An objective of the present effort is to develop computational tools to study the validity of such assumptions.
Titulo: Multidimensional flow, thermal, and chemical behavior in solid-oxide fuel cell button cells

Sentencas: A three-dimensional computational fluid dynamics (CFD) model is developed and applied to a particular SOFC button cell, characterizing the fluid flow, chemistry, and thermal transport.
Titulo: Multidimensional flow, thermal, and chemical behavior in solid-oxide fuel cell button cells

Sentencas: Results show that when inlet flow rates are sufficiently high, button-cell data can be interpreted using the commonly used assumptions.
Titulo: Multidimensional flow, thermal, and chemical behavior in solid-oxide fuel cell button cells

Sentencas: However, when flow rates are not Sufficient, the assumptions of uniform composition can be significantly violated.
Titulo: Multidimensional flow, thermal, and chemical behavior in solid-oxide fuel cell button cells

Sentencas: Additionally, depending on operating conditions there can be significant temperature variations within the gas compartments and the membrane-electrode assembly.
Titulo: Multidimensional flow, thermal, and chemical behavior in solid-oxide fuel cell button cells
